name: Your Lab

exits.description: You see a wall. You can't go that direction.
You see a wall. You can't go that direction.
To the east is a doorway leading to one of the less used science rooms.
You see a wall. You can't go that direction.
Trying to peer through the hole momentarily blinds you with sunlight.  It must lead outside.
You see a wall. You can't go that direction.
You see a wall. You can't go that direction.
You see a wall. You can't go that direction.
You look up and see the ceiling.
You look down and see carpet.

description: The chemistry room expands around you.  There is a forlorn looking room through the doorway off to your East;  To the South is a mousehole.
